summary: This adds a new enemy race called, \"Hybrids\".
descriptionHtml:
This adds a new enemy race called, \"Hybrids\". They look like werewolves 

and are twice in size of one of them(werewolf). They have a high amount of 

health that is 10000 so in order to kill one your going to need a weapon, 

e.g. deadric sword, that has high enchantment. They resist fear so watch 

out if you want to kill it using a fear enchanted weapon. Sadly your going 

to need to use the console to spawn one cause I was lazy to waste time 

placing one by one around Tamriel. Instructions: open console using ~ key 

below the escape key. Then type help hybrid. After that an npc called 

hybrid or hybrids will be listed. So then type, player.placeatme .....

(code of the hybrid npc). This actually follows the hybrid race file as 

this new enemy has the same power as Hybrid Breton in hybrid race. So 

spawn one, a couple of guards, around 10, then have a lot of FUN! Caution, 

its attacks are powerful!
author: Ajw
